@StitchTheChi:

For anyone having problems with in-game voices (sped up and squeaky like Alvin and Chipmunks or Smurfs), you need to turn off audio hardware acceleration on your PC.

Go to Start->Run and type in "dxdiag"

Then Click on the "Sound" tab and move the slider for "Hardware Sound Acceleration Level" all the way to the left, so it's set to "No Acceleration."

That should solve your audio problems.
